a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rates from different causes, United States

Reported annual death rate from different causes per 100,000 people, based on the
underlying cause
listed on
death certificates. Comparisons may be affected by differences in measurement.

Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is
age-standardized
. All deaths in a country may not have been

registered with a
cause of death
. Only a selection of categories are shown.
